title: Compatibility changes for older android versions
message:
Compatibility changes for older android versions

* Use custom compare method instead of using the library function
(compare for Integer and Long was introduced in java 7)

More improvements

* Remove wrong imports

title: Improvements
message:
Improvements

title: Updates
message:
Updates

* Call onCompletion instead of manually restarting the song
* Visual fix - ignore NOTE_TYPE_SIMULT_END when  choosing texture for
upcoming circle
* call system input when tapping the offset boxes allowing players to
set the values manually

title: Update libgdx version to 1.7
message: Update libgdx version to 1.7

title: Minor Changes
message:
Minor Changes

* Correct some comments
* Make sure nothing else reads the speed from the notes.

title: New Stuff
message:
New Stuff

* A-B Repeat mode
* Play speed rate multiplier
* Live options screen
** Attempt to fix the randomizers by adding a 5 ms threshold to prevent
simultaneous taps on the same side as a release.
** Make the randomizers use the speed from the config rather than from
the beatmap definition as it's been deprecated.

title: Minor changes
message:
Minor changes

* Remove unused sprites
* Re-generate images
* Minor changes to calculating accuracy - ignore hit time for misses.

title: Merge pull request #8 from nexAkari/visual_improvements
message:
Merge pull request #8 from nexAkari/visual_improvements

Visual improvements
* The TapZone highlight effect now quickly fades out instead of disappearing instantly.
* CircleMarks can now move past the TapZones. They will smoothly fade out until they disappear.
* While holding, the the initial CircleMark will stay visible, locked onto the tap zone (similar to SIF).
* Various improvements for hold visuals, see 2ee524963d9886224fcbf688673607ac90aa7909

title: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into visual_improvements
message: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into visual_improvements

title: Improved the appearance of holds:
message:
Improved the appearance of holds:

    * The beam is now textured so that it no longer ends abruptly.
    * The hold end texture has been changed to a "light bulb" similar to SIF.
    * The hold start markers no longer use a special texture.
    * The beam now pulsates while holding.
    * The hold end markers can now move past the TapZones. That will cause the end marker and the beam to smoothly fade out, similar to normal markers.

message:
Minor FX Improvements

* Spawn accuracy markers with 0.75 alpha instead of 0, otherwise it'll
give a false visual delay.
* Set boundaries for alpha between 0 and 1
* Add fade-out logic to the accuracy markers in the accuracy bar

title: Update version
message: Update version

title: UI changes
message:
UI changes

* Add nice accuracy markers with soon/late indicators
* Resize the accuracy bar
* Change the color of the accuracy markers displayed on tap on the
accuracy bar

title: Suggested changes
message:
Suggested changes

Add buttons to the results screen.

title: Mild changes
message:
Mild changes

* Add sync modes
* - Default (the one which the app used up till now)
* - Constant ( use the timestamps every time they're available)
* - Initial (Sync only at the very beginning of the song / unpause)
* - No sync
* Display the random mode selected in the results screen if the player
selected random

title: Add a fixed threshold to prevent notes spawning on the same spot in extreme mode
message: Add a fixed threshold to prevent notes spawning on the same spot in extreme mode

title: Update version to 1.6.2
message: Update version to 1.6.2

title: Crash Fix and build fix
message:
Crash Fix and build fix

* Prevent the app from getting out of bounds when there's no songs
loaded and the user goes into the song selection screen.
* Remove redundant code

title: More Randomizers!
message:
More Randomizers!

* Add 2 more randomziers (as suggested by MilesElectric168 from reddit.

title: Tweaks to the randomizers
message:
Tweaks to the randomizers

Use 1/4 of the note speed as a threshold for the randomizers to go into
side swapping mode.

title: More  random modes
message:
More  random modes

* Keep sides: will randomize notes only within the scope  of their side
* Mirrored keep sides: Will randomize notes in the opposite side of
their original placement.

title: New random modes
message:
New random modes

* Added a config option to change the random mode
* Implemented the 'old' randomizing algorithm used by SIF

title: Interface and Option changes
message:
Interface and Option changes

* Add sorting modes (Settings > Other > Sorting Mode) supports only file
name and song name sorting
* Song selection screen changes:
* - Group songs by resource name
* - Split the song selection gui into 2 panels, top panel for songs,
bottom panel for difficulty in order to reduce the amount of scrolling
* replace stack traces with Gdx errors

title: Update version
message: Update version

title: Revert change to the renderer.
message: Revert change to the renderer.

title: Improvements
message:
Improvements

Speed up the effect processing by:
- sorting the notes by timing and looking ahead only for notes which
have the same timing.
- skip  processing notes which already have been processed

title: Load CRC for .osu files, not for every file.
message: Load CRC for .osu files, not for every file.

title: Improvements
message:
Improvements

Update the song loader to check the checksum of the .osu file that
generated the .rs file in case it was imported from a .osz or .osu file.
If the CRC  sum is matched, we skip map generation, otherwise we
regenerate/create the beatmap.

title: Major changes
message:
Major changes

* Load .osu beatmap files
* Load .osz beatmap packages
* Add more metadata into the beatmaps for map creators - more info in
the wiki
* - Allow creators to specify custom difficulty names
* - Allow creators to specify the lead-in time before the music starts
playing rather than calculating it
* - Allow creators to specify the file name of the music file used for
the beatmap allowing for more freedom in the file naming conventions.
* New setting option Other/Reload beatmaps to hard-reload beatmaps
present in /beatmaps/datafiles/
* Offset tweaks - more info on the wiki about correct configuration
* Add support for up to 9K mode of osu! mania maps.

title: Minor changes

Minor changes

* Update regex used for file name matching

title: Changes related to file loading
message:
Changes related to file loading

* When loading assets, only load files with the .rs extension
* Load the beatmap again in the BeatmapLoadingScreen to fetch all the
actual errors
* Add a message for files with an invalid JSON format

title: Minor fixes
message:
Minor fixes

Store the "play hint sounds" option as well.

title: PC - friendly changes
message:
PC - friendly changes

* Use the ESCAPE button as the 'back button' in some screens

title: More tweaks
message:
More tweaks

* Cancel changes if the user uses the back button.

title: More nullchecks
message:
More nullchecks

* Prevent app from crashing if user doesn't specify notes_speed in their
beatmaps

title: Minor changes
message:
Minor changes

* Update beatmap song name on load to reflect whether the format is
valid or not.

title: Minor changes
message:
Minor changes

* Set note speed to default values on map creation, rather than on
validation.
* Rename the 'return to main menu' button to reflect what it actually
does
* Get rid of the 'exit' button - who uses this anyway? It only  brings
trouble... why would anyone exit the app, right?
* Add text wrap to the errors displayed on the loading screen
* Do not modify the beatmap on validation, just validate it.

title: Nullcheck
message: Nullcheck

title: Minor stuff
message:
Minor stuff

* Prevent crashing if a valid song was loaded, but the beatmap contained
warnings.

title: Improvements
message:
Improvements

* Dynamic loading of beatmaps in 2 phases (more info in the wiki)
* Improvements to the randomizer
* Provide more feedback to users regarding errors in their beatmaps.
* Allow users to not specify rank info in their beatmaps, default values
will be calculated instead.

title: Configuration changes
message:
Configuration changes

* New configuration screen with tabs (kinda)
* New input offset setting which should allow compensating for input lag
* Fix an issue with random mode being toggled  when users pressed the
'back' button in the song selection screen

title: New stuff
message:
New stuff

Randomizer - Randomize the position of the notes from a beatmap. This
more or less follows the scheme used by SIF.
Add an option to play in 'random mode' from the song selection screen

title: Sync improvements
message:
Sync improvements

Thanks to @nexAkari for the sync patch.
I polished and added a bit of fps smoothening to create 'smooth'
transitions between frames.

title: Add validation for the beatmaps
message:
Add validation for the beatmaps

* Don't just crash blindly when an incorrect format map is loaded.
* Allow the application to start up if there's malformed maps.
* Visually report to the user that their map is invalid and display the
name of the file.
* Don't allow users to play beatmaps which are flagged as invalid.

title: Major overhaul
message:
Major overhaul

* Remove state maps with boolean flags to increase performance -
accessing maps can be expensive.
* Implement synchronization of beatmaps vs music
* Remove sound on preview (song selection) because of potential memory
leaks.
* Add a delay for maps which have early notes (within noteSpeed from the
song start)
* Add a 'sound hint' option in the settings menu
* Expand the offset setting from 150 to 250 ms
* Reduce the amount of time required to close the results screen from 5
to 2 seconds.
* Remove 'music' from the global assets, load one track per playthrough

title: Minot changes
message:
Minot changes

* Allow the escape key to be handled as 'back' during song play
* Change the order of rendered elements so that the 'tap to continue/tap
to begin' messages stop appearing behind other UI elements

title: More tweaks
message:
More tweaks

* Remove unused stuff.
* Fix holds not breaking combo on release regardless of accuracy (except
for miss)

title: Refactoring and improvements
message:
Refactoring and improvements

* Get rid of duplicate variables
* Move logic into smaller functions
* Create a despawning marker
* Manage combo/score on hit rather than 'on next update'
* Fix fake FC from being FC
* Remove unused stuff from World
* Improve some logic conditions to reduce redundancy

title: System overhaul.
message:
System overhaul.

* Set base resolution to 720 to handle upscale/downscale based on each
device
* Update timing to match those from SIF
* Create despawning accuracy markers (despawn after 5 seconds)
* Set miss time = 0.5*note speed instead of a fixed value of half-second
* minor refactoring in the update method for the circles
* Re-sizing of the accuracy bar to match the new accuracy ranges
* Set a step size of 1 for the offset setting.
* Remove the list of accuracy marks, we store despawning markers which
will also store the timing data.

title: Tweaks
message:
Tweaks

* Remove offset from the accuracy bar, it's already added to the times.
* Allow users to exit the current song by tapping back twice.
* Correct the placement of the progress bar in the loading screen

title: Apply offset in a more 'user friendly' way
message:
Apply offset in a more 'user friendly' way

Prevent de-synchronization between the circles and the timing.

title: Remove items which may be copyrighted
message:
Remove items which may be copyrighted

This includes splash screen, score progress knobs and icons.

message: Update readme

message:
change the implementation for tapped zone detection

* Tapzones are delimited by arcs, the circle is just visual.
* Use old implementation for holds using pointer on release, should fix
the issue with holds not being released

title: GUI improvements
message:
GUI improvements

Set font size and element position dynamically based on the screen
resolution
